short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ultimate productivty booster for your notes and bookmarks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your productivity with this blazingly-fast bookmark and note-saving tool. With the ability to search through your bookmarks and categorize your notes, finding important information has never been easier.

To save a bookmark or note, simply select the text on any website and press 'ctrl + left mouseclick'. You'll get a save popup, where you can add your own tags and edit the selected text if you wish.

To access the options menu, press 'ctrl + right mouseclick' and you'll be taken to the options page.
